entry.value: library(tidyr)%%00010library(dplyr)%%00010%%00010df <- knime.in%%00010%%00010# create a design and sample list%%00010design <- unlist(strsplit(knime.flow.in[["design_string"]], ","))%%00010sample_no <- length(unique(df$Sample))%%00010%%00010# create custom palette%%00010palette_cols <- c("#3366CC", "#DC3912", "#FF9900", "#109618", "#990099",%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009 "#0099C6", "#DD4477", "#66AA00", "#B82E2E", "#316395",%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009 "#994499", "#22AA99", "#AAAA11", "#6633CC", "#E67300",%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009 "#8B0707", "#651067", "#329262", "#5574A6", "#3B3EAC")%%00010%%00010# create plot colors and linetypes variables%%00010%%00010if(knime.flow.in[["use_design"]] == 1){ # if design is used to group samples, one linetype/different color for every group%%00010%%00009design_values_no <- length(levels(as.factor(design)))%%00010%%00009plot_cols <- palette_cols[1:design_values_no]%%00010} else { # if no design or design not used for colors, one linetype/different color for every sample%%00010%%00009if(sample_no > 20){%%00010%%00009%%00009palette <- colorRampPalette(palette_cols)%%00010%%00009%%00009plot_cols <- palette(sample_no)%%00010%%00009} else {%%00010%%00009%%00009plot_cols <- palette_cols[1:sample_no]%%00010%%00009}%%00010}%%00010%%00010plot_cols_str <- paste(plot_cols, collapse = ",")%%00010%%00010# create flow variables for plot colors and lines%%00010knime.flow.out <- list(plot_cols = plot_cols_str)%%00010%%00010knime.out <- knime.in

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
